page.title: 09SHOPPERS IN TYTHERINGTON
page.content: There are two shops in{Tytherington.} One of them is a{Post Office.}This also sells{drinks, confectionery}and{ {convenience goods.}There is also a{ {village shop}which sells{papers, {sweets}and{household goods.}Residents think this is sufficient. Most people go out of the village to do their shopping. Out of 40 residents who answered our questionnaire, we discovered that most people went to{ {Safeway}in{Thornbury}to do general shopping ({7}people went to{Co-op, 6} went to{Tesco's,}and{4}to{Carrefour.}) From the same survey we also found that most people preferred to shop weekly ({6}went{daily,4 fortnightly.}) People also get food delivered. There is a{baker, milkman, fishmonger, {grocer,}and a{butcher}who deliver in{ {Tytherington.}
